speaker: Agent
text: Hi, this is Jason calling from XYZ Collections. How are you today?

speaker: Customer
text: I'm doing well, but who are you looking for?

speaker: Agent
text: I’m reaching out regarding a past due balance on your account with First National Bank.

speaker: Customer
text: I think you have the wrong person. I don’t have an account there.

speaker: Agent
text: I apologize for the mix-up. Can I please confirm your name to ensure I'm not contacting the wrong person?

speaker: Customer
text: Sure, it's Lisa Grant. I really don’t have any association with that bank.

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you, Lisa. I will update our records immediately to prevent any further calls.

speaker: Customer
text: I appreciate that. Thank you for clearing this up.

speaker: Agent
text: You're welcome, Lisa. Have a great day!
